body:
Serbian  couple Vuk and Verica Nastic have been going through the hell since the June 2010 after the American Child Protection Agency (CPA) took away their children, son Damjan and daughter Nastasija, because of alleged negligence and sexual abuse.  
 
The drama occured when in Vuk’s lap top have been found pictures of his naked children afterward the police and representatives of the CPA burst into Nastic’s house in Stancton, California. They handcuffed Vuk and Verica leading them to prison while children  have been sent in a Mexican and later in an Arab foster family. 
 
Vuk Nastic was released on bail of $ 18,000, while his wife was released after six days. 
 
The children immediately made a statement according which little Damjan made photos while playing with camera. 
 
  Nastić said that the evidence in this was that his son was "upstairs in the hallway playing and he says something in English to the camera and he plays naked and that lasts for about 5 to 10 seconds and that’s it. And you could hear my voice from the ground floor saying to my wife: Verica, pass me this, or something like that. So the kids were upstairs alone, and we were downstairs and that lasted for ten seconds, no evidence what so ever. Yet they used it to break us and the kids." 

On September 1. their attorneys and CPA signed a deal – Nastics will confess their guilt that they are unduly worried about the kids because they are allowed to use the camera while the other two counts will be eliminated.
 
The Nastićs have engagged a team of Serbian psychologists, Zoran Milivojević, Žarko Korać and Žarko Trebješanin, that have sent a letter to the California court explaining the cultural differences between Serbia and America. 
 
Trebješanin says that the problem is cultural, and that the Americans should take that into consideration, because their citizens experience the same situation when they are arrested in Arab countries for not wearing a veil over the face, or for bathing in a swim suit. 
 
 "In our culture children are perceived as completely asexual and it isn’t unusual that they take baths with their parents. It is nothing unusual that they are photographed and I believe that everyone has in their family album their own naked photo (as a child), or their child’s. It does not produce any erotic feeling, they are just perceived as little kids. I believe that the Americans must understand those differences. As a nation, we touch, hug and kiss more than some other northern nations," says Trebješanin. 

The members of Facebook group “ Podrska porodici Nastic – Support to Nastic family” calls people to post the own naked picture from the childhood as a way of public defiance. Some of them extremely distasteful posted the picture of the own children exposing them to the risk of misusing on Internet.  But it seems that they are not aware of it...
 
Stevan Zivkov posted  common picture with his naked little daughter in yard’s pool,  while Marina Markovic posted three own naked pictures from childhood…
 
She praises: 
 
 “ Me when I was 6 months old, and 4 years old...

Danijela Petkovic says:
 
 “ This is life lesson for our Serbs abroad and in Serbia! Hold the Serbia and our laws, customs and culture! We are only in the world that have something “our”  that Americans have never had or they will never have so they would like take it away from us “ 

Marina Markovic warned on You tube video with two American children who were recorded in bath tub… 
 
Dubravka Grmuša Hoe explains: 
 
 " They are not only naked but they already play with plastic cutlery into the water in which they maybe have pissed. Just imagine what would happen if they slipped (because I did not noticed  cloth or something similar under their butts) and swallowed the knife and fork. The parents should have imprisoned on on several grounds. But they are "American" parents… ''

Boni Macanovic recalls the similar days in his life:
 
 “ I live in the USA for twenty years and in one moment they could have taken my children. They arrested my wife because she had brought children to the edge of a rails in the Metro showing them how rails look like. They let her the same night because the prosecutor dismissed the case as unfounded, but social "workers"  have besieged the house a few days until I called "Civil Rights". We paid them about $ 850 and they threatened to them (social service) after which the case was closed. I suggest the family Nastic to call the "Civil Rights Movement".  Social service will not get a money from Government  if not  "make" the case. Family Nastic was an ideal opportunity ...”

Mira Popovic - Keser is not surprised by the story but she cannot hide the own bad feeling 
 
 " Really horrible ! It would be difficult to find a photo album  in Serbia and former Yugoslavia without such pictures, especially when sons have been born. Dads are proud of the children! But in this American continent you risk a lot even you stroke the own child, not talking about the other's...Sick and perverted people, without emotions, fears … Serbia would definitely have to get involved in this case and that his authority (if it still has to) protect the family Nastic.

After six months of silent Serbian highest authorities involved in this case. 
 
Serbian President Boris Tadic personally engaged in solving this problem treating it as a problem of highest diplomatic level.  Vuk Nastic wrote the letter of gratitude to the President saying among other things : 
 
 “Once again a big thank you Mr. President, and to know that your selfless gesture of support will remain in our souls and we will tell the story over the generations of our family..."

In same time also reacted the people who think that photographing of naked children should not be called a culture and tradition ...
 
23 Natasha says:
 
 " It is not known exactly when and what happened, but if small 7-years-old boy photogrpahed 4-years-old sister while bathing in a tub in the presence of the father, it is not normal for me and it is far from the culture .....''

Decameron is trying to be funny:
 
 " O My Lord " ... I have a picture from the sea where my naked child trying to put his penis in a glass bottle of Pepsi ... I was dying of laughing... We did not know it was illegal. Lucky that it is not in our country. "

It is obvious that the Serbian tradition and American law are in more than a serious collision. It is clear that both sides have to correct various cultural and legal attitudes. 
 
Serbian people must accept that there is nothing impressive in photographing of naked children having in a view the risks and psychopathology of present time that children have been exposed. 
 
U.S legal system and CPA also should re-examine the own works that is certainly not great. Far from it. 
 
Former CPA officer recommends to family what do if CP social workers are investigating them stressing that Child Protective Services laws and agencies are abusive to families and children.
 
According blic.rs little Nastics also suffer certain forms of discrimination. 
 
They were forbidden to speak Serbian and one of foster families led them to the Catholic church even though the children belong to the Orthodox Christianity
